channel.title: General Hiromi Travel Japan Taxes Slacker on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Hiromi Travel Japan Taxes Slacker on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: i just woke up... heh. 19 hours of sleep
item.description: hahaha. i didn’t mean to. i had set my alarms for 8pm last night. but apparently i didn’t hear it or anything else until about 2 today. hah. whoops. Well.. i was going to write up my experience in japan. I still think i will. However not right now. I also need to annotate all my pictures and such as well. If you want to know about my trip right now!
